        private void back​(Command pBack)

      • interpretCommand

        public void interpretCommand​(java.lang.String pCommandLine)
        Given a command, process (that is: execute) the command. If this command ends the game, true is returned, otherwise false is returned.
        Parameters:
        pCommandLine - est un est un eString
